name: FireFight (itch) (Sean Michael)
description:
Made this game as part of a challenge against a friend(He definitely won, check out his game here: https://benjaminpilbrow.itch.io/kenny-survivors)

THEME: Growth
CONSTRAINT: Can only use art from the following asset pack - Micro Roguelike · Kenney

FireFight:
Fight to keep the fire alive, people are going to come put it out! Keep it lit by chopping down trees, keep your trees healthy by watering them
